mapper.select: select t.rule_alloc_id, t.rule_alloc_name, t.remark, t.create_at, t.update_at, t.wh_id, t.is_enable, nvl((select su.user_name from sys_login_agent sla inner join sys_user su on su.user_id = sla.user_id where to_char(sla.login_id) = t.create_by), t.create_by) create_by, nvl((select su.user_name from sys_login_agent sla inner join sys_user su on su.user_id = sla.user_id where to_char(sla.login_id) = t.update_by), t.update_by) update_by from rule_alloc t where t.wh_id = #{wh_id} and t.is_enable = 1 --@ and t.rule_alloc_id = #{rule_alloc_id}

select a.rule_item_id, a.rule_alloc_id, a.order_type, a.order_biz_type, a.owner_id, a.item_id, a.alloc_type, a.rule_order, a.create_at, a.update_at, a.is_enable, b.owner_name, c.item_name, nvl((select su.user_name from sys_login_agent sla inner join sys_user su on su.user_id = sla.user_id where to_char(sla.login_id) = a.create_by), a.create_by) create_by, nvl((select su.user_name from sys_login_agent sla inner join sys_user su on su.user_id = sla.user_id where to_char(sla.login_id) = a.update_by), a.update_by) update_by from rule_alloc_items a left join bas_owner b on a.owner_id = b.owner_id left join bas_item c on c.item_id = a.item_id where a.rule_alloc_id = #{rule_alloc_id} and a.is_enable = 1
